arts.ttl: Eddie Howe hails ‘big step forward’ as Newcastle move into top three
arts.sum: The Magpies are locked in a tense battle for Champions League qualification.

arts.ttl: Newcastle go third and relegate Ipswich
arts.sum: Ipswich Town's relegation from the Premier League was confirmed as the 10-man Tractor Boys lost 3-0 at Newcastle United, who climbed back into the UEFA Champions League places. Ipswich remain 18th in the table, with this defeat ending any mathematical chance of catching West Ham United.

arts.ttl: Newcastle Utd 3-0 Ipswich Town: Relegation confirmed for ten-man Tractor Boys after Tyneside drubbing
arts.sum: Ipswich Town will return to the Championship after one season in the top flight

arts.ttl: Ten-man Ipswich relegated after Isak and Burn fire Newcastle up to third
arts.athr: Louise Taylor at St James' Park
arts.sum: On a day when Ipswich’s long, inevitable relegation was rubber stamped, normal service was resumed at Newcastle as Eddie Howe exchanged hospital grapes for his trademark managerial chewing gum and returned to the home technical area to see his side rise to third in the Premier League. By the second half the after-effects of the pneumonia that had resulted in Howe missing Newcastle’s past three matches and spending several nights in hospital were perhaps taking their toll as, unusually, he spent long periods sitting down in the dugout. Despite taking a bit of time to hit their stride, Howe’s players ultimately proved far too good for visitors reduced to 10 men by Ben Johnson’s 37th-minute dismissal. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Newcastle 3-0 Ipswich: 3 talking points as match officials take centre stage
arts.sum: Talking points and full analysis from Newcastle's 3-0 win over Ipswich which confirms the latter's relegation.

arts.ttl: Ipswich relegated after 3-0 loss at Newcastle
arts.sum: Ipswich Town were relegated from the Premier League on Saturday following a 3-0 defeat away to Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: Ipswich relegated from Premier League after heavy Newcastle defeat
arts.sum: Newcastle 3-0 Ipswich: Eddie Howe returned to the dugout as his team shot back into the top four

arts.ttl: Ipswich relegated as Newcastle boost Champions League hopes
arts.sum: Ipswich have been relegated to the Championship after a 3-0 loss at Newcastle as Eddie Howe's side put their Champions League qualification hopes back on track.

arts.ttl: Newcastle 3-0 Ipswich: Player ratings as Magpies rise to third and relegate Tractor Boys
arts.sum: Player ratings from Newcastle's 3-0 victory over Ipswich that relegated the Tractor Boys.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United 3-0 Ipswich Town: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Champions League race heats up, visitors relegated
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Newcastle United and Ipswich Town.
